app.about.title: ABOUT ME
app.about.paragraph-one: I consider myself a technology enthusiast and its impact on our daily lives, I like to seek challenges and get out of my comfort zone. I have a degree in Information Systems and a postgraduate degree in Software Engineering, I am always looking for new learning in the most diverse areas of knowledge, because I believe that knowledge is fundamental to success.
app.about.paragraph-two: As I improve my skills and expand my knowledge, I realize that learning is a pleasurable and infinite process of constant evolution.
app.experience.title: EXPERIENCE
app.experience.one.description-one: Create applications with responsive interfaces, create well-structured, efficient and testable codes, making use of software development best practices. Integrate data through the consumption of back-end services, create and maintain documentation of the developed software, among others.
app.experience.one.description-two: Most used tools: ReactJS, NextJs, Typescript.
app.experience.two.description-one: Development of front-end and back-end interfaces based on the Javascript stack, applying SOLID development principles, unit and integration tests, in addition to clean code best practices.
app.experience.two.description-two: Most used tools: ReactJS, Typescript, NodeJS, Express, Postgres and SQL Server
app.skills.title: SKILLS
app.skills.react: Library created by Facebook focused on creating interfaces in a declarative, efficient and flexible way.
app.skills.next: Next.js is an open source React front-end development web framework created by Vercel that enables functionality such as server-side rendering and static website generation for React-based web applications.
app.skills.reactnative: React Native is a Javascript library created by Facebook. It is used to develop applications for Android and iOS systems natively.
app.skills.firebase: Firebase is a platform developed by Google for building mobile and web applications.
app.skills.figma: Figma is a free, online UI tool made for creating, collaborating, prototyping and inspecting.
app.skills.git: It is a distributed version control system, mainly used in software development, but it can be used to record edit history of any type of file.
app.skills.postgres: PostgreSQL is an object-relational database management system, developed as an open source project.
app.skills.sqlserver: Microsoft SQL Server is a relational database management system maintained by Microsoft.
app.skills.nodejs: Node.js is open-source, cross-platform software based on Google's V8 interpreter that allows you to run JavaScript code outside of a web browser.
app.skills.nestjs: NestJS is an open source Node.js framework intended for server-side application development.
app.projects.title: PROJECTS
app.projects.one.description: Freelance work developing the interface of a monitoring and financial management platform.
app.projects.two.description: Challenge proposed during a selection process for front-end developer. It is a question and answer form on various subjects, at the end we have a summary of the answers.
app.projects.three.description: It is a game that aims to allow children to practice the teachings acquired at school in a playful way using the theme of the POKEMON game.
app.projects.four.description: Collaborative project with the purpose of incorporation in the portfolio. It is a web application for querying anime on the kitsu api, with pagination and text search.
